message: Accept this generous offer and let's seal the deal!
Let's split it down the middle, no need to be greedy!
I'm not ready to split it down the middle just yet. I want more!
A slight adjustment from my previous offer. Still a fair deal, don't you think?
I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a decent offer!
I'll take the deal. It's not ideal, but I don't want to risk going to round 12!
